profile.post_content:
Flyer is an all media agency that develops services and solutions between technology and communication.

We have acquired extended experience about online and offline communication strategies and planning, web design and development, live video and performances, so we can offer products and services ranging from creating and promoting your web presence, to organizing and supporting live events and visual performances.

We are the right partner for everyone wishing to increase their business by investing in technology and communication with an original, creative and innovative approach.

We sum up skills, professionalism and imagination. We are a team of creative people, technology experts, consultants, communicators, video-artists and performers: our aim is to understand the changes taking place in our world and propose original and customized solutions for them.

We can offer new, refreshing ideas for an open and innovative use of technology. We combine strategy and creativity to define and improve the relationship with the environment in which we operate.

profile.wpcf-row-1-col-1-html-box:
Web & Mobile

Flyer communication offers creativity, consulting, development, tools, support and management of the online, mobile and social networks presence of organizations and companies and their events: from concept and project, to design, to software development as to the creation and management of textual, photographic, video and interactive contents.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-1-html-box-original:
Web & Mobile

Flyer communication offers creativity, consulting, development, tools, support and management of the online, mobile and social networks presence of organizations and companies and their events: from concept and project, to design, to software development as to the creation and management of textual, photographic, video and interactive contents.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-2-html-box:
Live Visuals

From the experience of the Lab projects as FLxER, one of the first software to manage the live video and then from 2004 with LPM, now the largest event of Audio Visuals Performing Arts, Flyer is able to offer creativity, contents and services for small and major cutting edge events.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-2-html-box-original:
Live Visuals

From the experience of the Lab projects as FLxER, one of the first software to manage the live video and then from 2004 with LPM, now the largest event of Audio Visuals Performing Arts, Flyer is able to offer creativity, contents and services for small and major cutting edge events.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-3-html-box:
Learning

The learning area is born from years of experience of Flyer in Audio Visuals Performing Arts events and web-mobile communication that has allowed the development of this new spin off relying on the preparation and practical experience of its teachers.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-3-html-box-original:
Learning

The learning area is born from years of experience of Flyer in Audio Visuals Performing Arts events and web-mobile communication that has allowed the development of this new spin off relying on the preparation and practical experience of its teachers.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-4-html-box:
Lab

In addition to carrying out its ordinary activities, Flyer communication have distinguished in the last decade for the innovative, original and experimental of his designs and creativity, born in the laboratory experimental research Flyer Lab, and become the result of important prizes and awards, as well as the protagonists of prestigious artistic and cultural cutting edge events of international significance.

Read more

content.rendered:
Version 2.0 of Mongo Invoices, the first Italian open source software for managing invoices, offers and customers, created by Gianluca Del Gobbo with the support of Fabrizio Chiovoloni and the small but valuable support of Gilles Ruppert.

Mongo Invoices is based on MongoDB and NodeJS Flyer communication technologies began to study from 2013.

Start to use it right now and, if you want, collaborate in its development!
https://github.com/gianlucadelgobbo/mongo-invoices

content.rendered:
New web site for the new edition of Live Cinema Festival 2016!

The contents of the site are also available via smartphone.

On the site you can find information about the program and the locations, artists and performances, and view materials.

content.rendered:
Mobile and Tablet App on iOS and Android platforms for the new edition of Live Performers Meeting, LPM 2016 Amsterdam!

On the app you can find information about the venue, program, artists and performances.


[Show slideshow]

content.rendered:
New web site for the new project Engage Audiences, “Study on audience development – How to place audiences at the centre of cultural organisations” is a study by Fondazione Fitzcarraldo, together with Culture Action Europe, ECCOM and Intercult, as a consortium, developed in the framework of the Creative Europe programme.

The contents of the site are also available via smartphone.

On the site you can find information about the project and view materials of the study.

We have created an “EXTRA” webpage to keep you up to date with the activities of Flyer throughout the year: events in collaboration with our partners, workshops and performances presented by Flyer at international festivals, and news about the latest trends in the field of Audio Visuals Performing Arts an communication. Join us, and follow the community!!!

page_data.description: Flyer is an all media agency that develops services and solutions between technology and communication in the web, live video and performances.
page_data.headtitle: Flyer new media | Creativity and tools for cutting edge events
